astraiea.layer2.strategies

Class SimpleIncrementing

  • java.lang.Object
    • astraiea.layer2.strategies.IncrementingStrategy
      • astraiea.layer2.strategies.SimpleIncrementing

  • public class SimpleIncrementing
extends IncrementingStrategy
    FIXME This is just a temporary method until SPRT can be implemented and so hasn't been thoroughly documented n runs are performed, if significance isn't achieved then n more runs are performed. It stops when significance is achieved, either after a bon ferroni correction has been performed or just un adjusted. It's safe but weak to stop after a bon ferroni correction and if this isn't used intermediate results are printed anyway so, as recommended by Arcuri and Briand, all the information is given.
    Author:
    Geoffrey Neumann
